code.title: Fullstack E-commerce Website for naima
code.description: A modern, accessible fullstack web application for Naima, a Swedish superfood fika brand. The site combines brand storytelling with e-commerce functionality, featuring an interactive retailer map, wholesale partner dashboard, and comprehensive product showcase.

code.title: Portfolio
code.description: You're looking at it. This is a showcase of user-centered design in action. Explore projects that merge creativity and functionality, all wrapped in clean aesthetics and intuitive navigation.

code.title: Happy Thoughts
code.description: A feel-good full-stack app where users can share positive thoughts and like each otherâ€™s messages. Built with React and Vite on the frontend, and Node.js with Express and MongoDB on the backend. The app features dynamic updates via a REST API, responsive design, and real-time message interaction.

code.title: Screamflix
code.alt: Screenshot of Screamflix horror movie browser
code.description: Together with Cathi, I created Screamflix, a curated archive that lets users explore horror films by decade. The design and concept were inspired by the aesthetics of classic horror, and the goal was to offer a fun and slightly spooky way to browse cult classics and hidden gems.

code.title: Weather App
code.alt: Screenshot of weather app showing current conditions
code.description: A responsive web-based application that fetches real-time weather data through API integration. Focused on a clear user flow and modern design.
